experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Healthcare Capacity Planning for Comorbid People during COVID-19Here suitable datasets have been collected and prepared based on the number of healthcare facilities for COVID patients as per their age and the presence of comorbidities like hypertension, CKD, diabetes, etc. on the daily basis. Suitable time series models have been then fitted using this data to forecast the healthcare facilities that might be required in the forthcoming days. The models have been implemented through a web portal which would allow common people to have a look at the forecasts made and the healthcare planners to update changes in the datasets. Guides: Prof. Goutam Sen, Prof. Sayak RoychowdhuryDepartment: Industrial and System Engineering, IIT Kharagpur
experience.description_html: Healthcare Capacity Planning for Comorbid People during COVID-19Here suitable datasets have been collected and prepared based on the number of healthcare facilities for COVID patients as per their age and the presence of comorbidities like hypertension, CKD, diabetes, etc. on the daily basis. Suitable time series models have been then fitted using this data to forecast the healthcare facilities that might be required in the forthcoming days. The models have been implemented through a web portal which would allow common people to have a look at the forecasts made and the healthcare planners to update changes in the datasets. Guides: Prof. Goutam Sen, Prof. Sayak RoychowdhuryDepartment: Industrial and System Engineering, IIT Kharagpur
